DataElement.preferredName: Prognostic Index for PTCL Risk Assessment Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric representation for the prediction of the risk of disease recurrence in an individual with peripheral T-cell lymphoma using the Prognostic Index for PTCL (PIT).

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Peripheral T-cell Lymphoma Prognostic Index Score Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A list of four factors to assess how an individual with peripheral T-cell lymphoma might respond to treatment and predict the risk of disease recurrence. The factors are: patient's age, LDH levels: serum levels often correlate with the amount of tumor in the body, performance status, and bone marrow involvement._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Top level term which includes Biological Markers, Risk Factors, and Prognostic Factors.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A list of four factors to assess how an individual with peripheral T-cell lymphoma might respond to treatment and predict the risk of disease recurrence. ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A risk group associated with a total score of 3 or 4 on the Prognostic Index for Peripheral T-cell Lymphoma indicating that an individual has a high risk.

Concepts.longName: Peripheral T-cell Lymphoma Prognostic Index Score 3-4
Concepts.definition: A risk group associated with a total score of 3 or 4 on the Prognostic Index for Peripheral T-cell Lymphoma indicating that an individual has a high risk.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A risk group associated with a total score of 2 on the Prognostic Index for Peripheral T-cell Lymphoma indicating that an individual has a intermediate-high risk.

Concepts.longName: Peripheral T-cell Lymphoma Prognostic Index Score 2
Concepts.definition: A risk group associated with a total score of 2 on the Prognostic Index for Peripheral T-cell Lymphoma indicating that an individual has a intermediate-high risk.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A risk group associated with a total score of 1 on the Prognostic Index for Peripheral T-cell Lymphoma indicating that an individual has a low-intermediate risk.

Concepts.longName: Peripheral T-cell Lymphoma Prognostic Index Score 1
Concepts.definition: A risk group associated with a total score of 1 on the Prognostic Index for Peripheral T-cell Lymphoma indicating that an individual has a low-intermediate risk.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A risk group associated with a total score of 0 on the Prognostic Index for Peripheral T-cell Lymphoma indicating that an individual has a low risk.

Concepts.longName: Peripheral T-cell Lymphoma Prognostic Index Score 0
Concepts.definition: A risk group associated with a total score of 0 on the Prognostic Index for Peripheral T-cell Lymphoma indicating that an individual has a low risk.
